attributes.action: Legislate Against the Producers of Packaging Waste such as Supermarkets before you legislate against the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a house holder in the UK my family and I are proud of the amount of waste we recycle. Yet the government and councils are constintly putting us all under pressure for creating a huge amount of landfill waste. All my waste that I through away comes from items I have to buy in a supermarket. The government therefore should look to legislate against the sources of such waste before legislating against us house holders.
